title: ZombieCashExchange
author: ZombieCashExchange
content: Multicurrency exchange service. We make exchange operations with a large number of electronic currencies, SWIFT and Cash exchanges all over The World.We work to make exchange operations with cryptocurrencies fast, safe and profitable for people.Our professional support team is ready to help you at any time and make the exchange process easy and enjoyable. We pay great attention to the cost of exchanges, we try to provide the best exchange rate.Applications are processed within 5 to 15 minutes. To encrypt these applications, a cryptographic SSL protocol is used, which guarantees the confidentiality and safety of your data.For your convenience, an adaptive interface has been developed that allows you to open the service from any device, be it a computer or a pocket gadget.Exchange operations are carried out in the following directions: BTC, ETH, LTC, USDT, Visa/MC RU, Visa/MC UA, PayPal, , Alfa Bank, Sberbank, SWIFT, Cash and others.Exchanges USDT-CASH in your city ( Moscow, Dubai, Istanbul, Tbilisi, Tashkent, Almaty, New York, Miami, Europe )We help you to pay your bills via SWIFTAdvantages:• Favorable exchange rate.• Wide range of destinations.• Currency conversion is safe and fast.• Availability of reserves in all directions.• There are unique exchange directions.• Convenient payment acceptance for your site.If you have your own online store, or you sell some kind of product or service, but do not have the ability to accept payment, then we will provide you with such an opportunity.You will be able to accept payments from different banks and payment systems at favorable rates for your customers!https://zombie.cash/en/merchant-docs/Contacts:• Website: https://zombie.cash/• E-mail: pr@zombie.cash• Online chat on the site: https://zombie.cash/• Telegram : https://t.me/zombiecashusdt
